product_name: Sierra Designs Microlight 2 Pants - Women's Petite
long_description: The Sierra Designs Microlight women's petite pants protect against wind and light rain. Plus, they pack up in their own stuff sack so you can throw them in just about any size bag. Tightly woven polyester taffeta blocks light wind and resists water. Seams are not sealed, but the Sierra Designs Microlight 2 pants offer water resistance in light rain for a short period of time. Waistband with elastic side panels and drawcord perfect the fit. Elastic leg hems and gusseted crotch. 2 zip hand pockets.
